vote.title: Authorize a professional engineering services contract with Kimley-Horn and Associates, Inc., to provide preliminary engineering services for pedestrian improvements within the boundaries of U.S. 75 on the west, Lovers Lane on the north, Greenville Avenue on the east, and Mockingbird Lane on the south - Not to exceed $473,578.00 - Financing: Mockingbird/US-75 Project Grant Fund (see Fiscal Information)
